menus.query_date: SELECT id_menu, re2.menu_name FROM (  SELECT menu.id_menu as id1, COUNT(is_part_of.id_recipe) as nb_total_recipe FROM menu INNER JOIN is_part_of ON menu.id_menu = is_part_of.id_menu GROUP BY menu.id_menu) AS re1 INNER JOIN (  SELECT menu.id_menu, menu.menu_name, COUNT(recipe.id_recipe) as nb_recipe_valid FROM menu INNER JOIN is_part_of ON menu.id_menu = is_part_of.id_menu INNER JOIN recipe ON is_part_of.id_recipe = recipe.id_recipe WHERE recipe.date_added >= $1::date GROUP BY menu.id_menu )AS re2 ON id1 = re2.id_menu WHERE  nb_total_recipe=nb_recipe_valid
menus.query_id_user: SELECT menu.id_menu, menu_name, "user".id_user, pseudo FROM menu INNER JOIN "user" ON menu.id_user="user".id_user WHERE menu.id_menu=$1::integer
menus.query_id_recipes: SELECT recipe.id_recipe, recipe_name FROM menu INNER JOIN is_part_of ON menu.id_menu = is_part_of.id_menu INNER JOIN recipe ON is_part_of.id_recipe = recipe.id_recipe WHERE menu.id_menu=$1::integer

recipes.everything: SELECT recipe.id_recipe, recipe.recipe_name, recipe.servings, category_name FROM recipe INNER JOIN is_category ON recipe.id_recipe=is_category.id_recipe INNER JOIN category ON is_category.id_category=category.id_category
recipes.query_id_ingredients: SELECT unit_name, quantity, ingredient.id_ingredient, ingredient.ingredient_name FROM recipe INNER JOIN constitute ON recipe.id_recipe = constitute.id_recipe INNER JOIN unit ON constitute.id_unit = unit.id_unit INNER JOIN ingredient ON constitute.id_ingredient = ingredient.id_ingredient WHERE recipe.id_recipe = $1::integer
recipes.query_id_description: SELECT pseudo, description_text, description.date_added FROM recipe INNER JOIN description ON recipe.id_recipe = description.id_recipe INNER JOIN "user" ON description.id_user = "user".id_user WHERE recipe.id_recipe = $1::integer ORDER BY description.date_added DESC LIMIT 1
recipes.query_id_comments: SELECT pseudo, comment_text FROM recipe INNER JOIN comment ON recipe.id_recipe = comment.id_recipe INNER JOIN "user" ON comment.id_user = "user".id_user WHERE recipe.id_recipe = $1::integer
recipes.query_id_notes: SELECT pseudo, note FROM recipe INNER JOIN note ON recipe.id_recipe = note.id_recipe INNER JOIN "user" ON note.id_user = "user".id_user WHERE recipe.id_recipe = $1::integer

ingredients.query_id_nc: SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, nc_name FROM ingredient INNER JOIN ingredient_characteristic ON ingredient.id_ingredient = ingredient_characteristic.id_ingredient INNER JOIN nutritional_characteristic ON ingredient_characteristic.id_nc = nutritional_characteristic.id_nc WHERE ingredient.id_ingredient = $1::integer

ingredients.query_ingredient: INSERT INTO ingredient(ingredient_name) VALUES ($1::text) RETURNING id_ingredient
ingredients.query_ing_charac: INSERT INTO ingredient_characteristic(id_nc, id_ingredient, quantity) VALUES ($1::integer , $2::integer , $3::integer)

menus.query_menu: INSERT INTO menu(menu_name, id_user) VALUES ($1::text, $2::integer) RETURNING id_menu
